duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, deploy, and maintain production-grade applications on Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
Implement and adhere to SRE principles, methodologies, and best practices
Utilize automation and scripting tools like Terraform, Ansible, or equivalent for infrastructure management
Implement and maintain monitoring and observability tools like Prometheus, Grafana, and Stackdriver
Contribute to incident response and post-incident reviews
Provide technical guidance and mentorship to the team

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (Master's degree preferred)
